product_name: NYX Professional MakeupSuede Matte Lip Liner Velvet Soft Vegan Lip Pencil
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackLine lips to perfection with NYX Professional Makeup Suede Matte Lip Liner. The velvety soft lip pencil enhances & adds definition to your favorite lip color.
details: DetailsBenefitsMatte lip liner pencil with medium to full coverageThese vegan lip liners enhance and add definition to your favorite matte lip colors whilst helping your lipstick stay on longerEvery lip shade goes on super smooth and provides the perfect base for their much-loved matte lipstickAvailable in a variety of richly pigmented shades created to partner your NYX Professional Makeup lip faves including Suede Matte Lipstick, Liquid Suede Cream Lipstick and Soft Matte Lip CreamThe velvety soft lip pencil also doubles as a lip plumper, enhancing lips to create a full, plump poutVegan formula (no animal-derived ingredient or by-product)Cruelty freeItem 2306906How To UseApply NYX Professional Makeup Suede Matte Lip Liner along the lip line for a precise look. Use the lip pen to fill in the lips for amped up color.Pro Tip: Use all over lips as a primer to enhance the wear of your lipstick.IngredientsLife's a Beach: Phenyl Trimethicone, Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire Microcristalline, Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Hydrogenated Cocoglycerides, Cocoglycerides, Synthetic Beeswax, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire de Carnauba, C10-18 Triglycerides, Ozokerite, Polyethylene, Alumina, Polybutene, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Paraffin, Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Talc, Palmitic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Tin Oxide, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Chlorite, Dolomite, Barium Sulfate (CI 77120), Magnesium Carbonate (CI 77713), Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 7 (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 36 (CI 12085), Manganese Violet (CI 77742).
how_to_use: Apply NYX Professional Makeup Suede Matte Lip Liner along the lip line for a precise look. Use the lip pen to fill in the lips for amped up color.Pro Tip: Use all over lips as a primer to enhance the wear of your lipstick.
ingredients: Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire Microcristalline
Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire de Carnauba

reviews.headline: Super good
reviews.comments: Nice color goes amazing with the gloss

reviews.headline: Tis hard to find 'Moonwalk' color.
reviews.comments: Tis the best color ever!  Need to stock Nampa Ulta with this color!

reviews.headline: Fav lipliner
reviews.comments: The suede matte lip liner is the perfect liner to use for outer edges when creating that perfect lip combo! Creamy but stays in place

reviews.headline: Great find!
reviews.comments: I love this gorgeous color, it's a little pink and a little lavender. It's perfect for me and goes well with almost anything I wear. It has a nice matte finish.

reviews.headline: Matte lip liner
reviews.comments: Glides smooth on lips. Don't let it get too hot! It will melt. Great for blending colors.

reviews.headline: Purchased for daughter
reviews.comments:
Got this for my teen daughter as her last one ran out. 
She loves this liner.

reviews.headline: Nyx liner
reviews.comments: Okay so its no shock to any of us that nyx never matches the actual cao color but its still so beuatiful!!

reviews.headline: Beautiful color and application
reviews.comments: I got two of these in the shades whipped caviar and cannes. I like how precise these pencils are â€” they are thin and pigmented so you can do a simple clean line around your lips. They are long lasting and dont smudge easily, and tbh they hold up better than some expensive liners. The only downside is they arent the creamiest, so if youre looking for a creamy liner you might wanna go with another option. Overall really good for the price.

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: Nice color, easy to resharpen.

reviews.headline: Beautiful color
reviews.comments: The perfect color; especially for fairer skin tones; it doesn't pull warm!

reviews.headline: I LOVE this color!!
reviews.comments: its sooo pretty ive bought this shade like three times its my go to color!

reviews.headline: chemical burn
reviews.comments: so I love nyx products, but I've tried to use them lip liner twice. First time using it I wasn't sure if it was my lipstick or the lip liner because both were new but I gave it another shot with my tried and true Estee Lauder lipstick, I got a chemical burn again. I really loved the color of the product and price but ouch!!!

reviews.headline: moonwalk is perf for cool/fair skin
reviews.comments: for reference, i my shade is 2.0 BU in the tower28 concealer. i have searched everywhere to find a brown lip liner that does not look too orange on my cool-toned fair skin. moonwalk is legitimately the perfect shade for me and at such an affordable price point, highly recommend trying it out!

reviews.headline: love repeat
reviews.comments: Purchased by granddaughter Love repeat

reviews.headline: Got the black shade
reviews.comments: It does stay on. It feels like i have nothing on the lips and it applied well.

reviews.headline: Nice product.
reviews.comments: It's definitely affordable with beautiful colors and is pretty pigmented, but I find it very dry and extremely hard to wipe off.

reviews.headline: Love this brand!
reviews.comments: I love this brand. Best, less pricey brand I've found. The range of colors is also a huge win. This is my go-to brand!

reviews.headline: Not the same anymore!
reviews.comments: It's a nice liner but the undertone of this liner is warmer now. Definitely not the cooler one I'm used to and I still have a bit left of my original one to compare. Wouldn't buy it again only because it's not really what I'm looking for color wise.

reviews.headline: I love these lip liners!! I recommend these
reviews.comments: These are so affordable and i love them! The only issue is the color of the liner doesnt match the color on the packaging and it makes it inconvenient! I also think they could be a little more creamy

reviews.headline: Best thing is the price
reviews.comments: For the price and reviews I thought they would be worth the buy. But they're not pigmented at all and did not glide on smoothly. Bought two to try and returned.

media.headline: Good lipliner

faceoff_positive.comments: So I bought this liner in the shade Brooklyn Thorn because the end of the pencil that shows the color is my perfect lip nude, which I was trying to find in a liner. But the actual color from the product doesn't match at all. It is a very dull purple. If it were one shade more brown instead of purple it could easily be a nude for people like me with deep complexion. The online swatch it horrendously inaccurate. If you are using the site as a swatch reference, don't. The product itself is actually very good. It's a comfortable smooth formula that glides right on. I prefer this formula to my Makeup Forever lip liner. If I found my perfect lip nude in this formula, I would never buy another liner again.
faceoff_positive.headline: Pretty Liner

faceoff_negative.comments: I have quite a few of these and different colors my go-to color was mahogany for every day on my last purchase realized it changed the formula does not apply smooth it's dry and rough and the worst part is the color is not the same I attached a picture it's hard to tell in the picture the one on the right is the new formula it has more pinkish tint the one on the left has more Brown tint super disappointing when this is a staple for me I can't use the new stuff it's crap
faceoff_negative.headline: The formula has changed
